sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>8</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Stun grenades use sonic waves, concussion shocks, and other methods to stun their targets.   Like frag grenades, stun grenades can be set to detonate on impact or set with a timer to detonate up to 3 rounds after being activated. Stun grenades rarely have pressure detonators.  Models Include: Merr-Sonn C-10 Stun Grenade.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Stun Grenade</name> <number>GEAR0001020</number> <price>75</price> <range>short</range> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 15:22:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>603baae82f10a450e0f497eef699b6ad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 15:22:21</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
